translation: Thus, always keeping the mind balanced, the yogi, with the mind controlled, attains the peace abiding in Me, culminating in liberation.
commentary: 6.15 Yunjan balancing? Evam thus? Always always? Atmana the self? Yogi Yogi? Niyatmanasaá¸¥ one with the controlled mind? Shantim to peace? Nirvanaparamam that which culminates in Nirvana (Moksha)? abiding in Me? acquires attains.Commentary Thus in the manner prescribed in the previous verse.The Supreme Self is an embodiment of peace. It is an ocean of peace. When one attains to the supreme peace of the Eternal? by controlling the modifications of the mind and keeping it always balanced? he attains liberation or perfection.
